title: Porsche’s ‘Tunnel Mode’ Is Proof They Understand Driving Joy Better Than Anyone
description: We know how much Porsche focuses on its engineering, however, a recently revealed patent underscores that they’re just as invested in your experience. The patent in question, filed with the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) late last year and published a few days ago, details a ...
titleSummary: Porsche Revs Up the Fun Factor with 'Tunnel Vision' Driving Experience
descriptionSummary: Porsche's commitment to innovative design is well-documented, but a new patent filing reveals an equally strong emphasis on crafting a premium driving experience that prioritizes user interaction.

title: BMW Drops Enticing 2026 X1 Lease Deal For November
description: In the United States, the BMW X1 flies a bit under the radar, simply because this market has a preference for larger luxury crossovers like the X3 and X5. But the current X1 generation is a much better vehicle than its predecessor. It’s spacious for a subcompact model, handles confidently, and is ...
titleSummary: "BMW Unveils Limited-Time Incentive for Affordable 2026 X1 Leasing"
descriptionSummary: While often overshadowed by bigger siblings in the US market, the BMW X1 shines with improved performance, generous interior space, and agile handling that belies its compact size, making it a worthy contender in its class.

title: All Kia EVs Just Got More Affordable with $10,000 Discounts
description: Just as September saw the $7,500 EV tax credit get axed, carmakers are jumping on the discount bandwagon to ring up sales. The latest entrant is Kia, offering a $10,000 customer cash discount across the company’s entire EV lineup. This comes after Kia slashed $8,500 off the 2025 Niro EV and $9,000 ...
titleSummary: "Kia Electrifies Savings: Brand Slashes Prices on All EV Models by $10,000"
descriptionSummary: As prices surge ahead of an impending tax credit cutback, automakers are rolling out deep discounts to keep electric vehicles moving. Kia is leading the charge with a one-time $10,000 cash incentive on all its EV models.

title: Honda Just Shut Down Dreams of a Prelude Type R
description: After months of rumors of a Type R-powered Prelude started swirling around, Honda finally has a semi-official answer. Unfortunately, it's not the one some folks wanted, much like the odds of the coupe ever getting a manual transmission option. Hint: it's zero. Don't get your hopes up with a ...
titleSummary: Honda Kills Hopes for a High-Performance Prelude Revival
descriptionSummary: Rumors have long swirled about a Type R-powered Prelude, but Honda's official response is underwhelming. A highly anticipated upgrade remains elusive, and an even more coveted feature – a manual transmission option for the coupe – appears to be a lost cause.

title: Gordon Murray's $20M McLaren F1-Inspired Hypercar Goes to Auction at the Las Vegas Grand Prix
description: Gordon Murray shocked the Monterey Car Week crowd this year when his newly formed Special Vehicles division unveiled the S1 LM, a five-unit tribute to the 1995 Le Mans-winning McLaren F1 GTR. Disappointingly for those with exceptionally deep pockets, the press release that accompanied the reveal ...
titleSummary: "Multi-Million-Dollar Dream Car Inspired by Racing Legend Heads to High-Stakes Auction in Sin City"
descriptionSummary: Gordon Murray's Special Vehicles division electrified Monterey Car Week this year with the unveiling of the S1 LM, a limited-edition tribute to the 1995 Le Mans-winning McLaren F1 GTR. The exclusive run has left many enthusiasts green with envy.

title: First Toyota Land Cruiser FJ Buyers Will Have a Hard Time
description: By now, everyone is aware that Toyota’s beloved FJ nameplate has officially returned. The new Land Cruiser FJ, shown publicly for the first time at the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, was easily one of the event’s most crowded displays. Automotive journalists from other countries (myself included) ...
titleSummary: "Luckiest Land Cruisers: Early Adopters Face a Bumpy Ride"
descriptionSummary: The eagerly anticipated return of Toyota's iconic FJ nameplate is now a reality. At this year's Japan Mobility Show, the newly unveiled Land Cruiser FJ stole the spotlight, drawing massive crowds and generating buzz among international automotive media.

title: Buick’s New Elite Minivan Makes Pacifica and Sienna Look Outdated
description: Minivans are few and far between in America today. The Toyota Sienna, Honda Odyssey, Kia Carnival, and Chrysler Pacifica are the typical flag bearers of what was once the family car of choice. However, with the popularity of crossovers and SUVs, the minivans have become a niche market – though a ...
titleSummary: "Buick's Bold Entrance: Redefining Family Haulers with Its Sleek New Luxury Van"
descriptionSummary: In today's automotive landscape, family-friendly minivans have largely fallen out of favor, relegated to a specialized niche as crossovers and SUVs dominate the market. The Toyota Sienna, Honda Odyssey, Kia Carnival, and Chrysler Pacifica hold on as stalwarts.

title: Hollywood’s Coolest Movie Cars Are Hitting the Auction Block
description: As a movie-loving car enthusiast with a Letterboxd account, some of my favorite movies happen to be those with an iconic car in them. The appearance of a particular vehicle can be as impactful as a specific actor's performance; this is why a 1967 Mustang named Eleanor is as heavily credited for its ...
titleSummary: "Iconic Wheels of Cinema History Set to Roll into Auction Action"
descriptionSummary: Car enthusiasts often find themselves captivated by films that feature exceptional vehicles, and I'm no exception. Iconic cars can be just as memorable as their stars, making movies like Gone in Sixty Seconds a true delight for fans of both cinema and automotive design.

title: Volkswagen Has Sweet Lease Deal for 2026 Atlas This November
description: Need a three-row European crossover but unwilling to pay premium prices? It seems that the Volkswagen Atlas is the only one that fits the bill. Launched in 2017 for the 2018 model year, the Atlas serves as the spiritual successor of the Touareg. Also known as the Terramont in other parts of the ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen Offers Hot November Leasing Deal on 2026 Atlas Models"
descriptionSummary: Looking for a practical three-row European-style crossover without the hefty price tag? The Volkswagen Atlas is a prime contender, offering a premium-like experience at a more affordable price point since its 2017 debut.

title: Are Automated Tire Inflators Any Good?
description: An automated tire inflator is one of those tools you don’t realize you need until you’re stranded somewhere wishing you had one. I recently tested the VIAIR EVC31 PRO rechargeable portable compressor, and it might just be one of the best small inflators on the market: compact, powerful, and ...
titleSummary: "Tread Carefully: Do Smart Tire Inflators Really Deliver?"
descriptionSummary: A portable tire inflator is a game-changer for anyone who's ever been stuck with a flat on the side of the road. The VIAIR EVC31 PRO is a standout model that packs impressive power into its compact design.

title: One-of-One Dodge Demon 170 From Kevin Hart’s Collection Is Headed to Auction
description: One of the rarest modern muscle cars ever built, a one-of-one 2023 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170 finished in PY5 Cream Sickle, is headed to Mecum Kissimmee 2026, crossing the block on Saturday, January 17. This example, VIN 2C3CDZL98PH100020, has only 20 ...
titleSummary: "Dodge Demon Rarity Hits Auction Block: A Piece of Kevin Hart's Exclusive Legacy"
descriptionSummary: A singular treasure in the world of high-performance vehicles is set to appear at Mecum Kissimmee 2026: a one-of-a-kind 2023 Dodge Challenger SRT Demon 170 finished in a stunning PY5 Cream Sickle hue. It crosses the block on January 17.

title: New Audi RS6 Avant Is Taking Shape — And It’s Keeping a Gas Engine
description: The last time we covered spy shots of an Audi RS6 Avant, we saw an all-electric prototype with split headlights. That high-performance electric wagon has now reportedly been canceled, but a combustion-powered RS6 is still happening, and as these new spy shots confirm, it won't conform to the split ...
titleSummary: "Sneak Peek: Audi's Powerful RS6 Avant Ditches Hybrid for V8 Muscle"
descriptionSummary: Audi's upcoming RS6 Avant had previously been spotted in all-electric guise, featuring striking split headlights. Although that model appears to have been axed, sources indicate a combustion-powered RS6 is still on track, with fresh spy photos revealing its more conventional design cues.

title: Europe Just Got the Affordable EV Americans Have Been Asking For
description: Renault has officially unveiled the Twingo E-Tech Electric, a bold reinvention of the iconic 1990s city car. Building on the joyful design of the original, the new model blends nostalgia with efficiency, practicality, and affordability. Developed in just 100 weeks under Renault’s “Leap 100” ...
titleSummary: "Budget-Friendly Electric Car Arrives in Europe, Finally Delivering on American Demands"
descriptionSummary: Renault has launched its revamped Twingo E-Tech Electric, a modern take on a retro icon. This fresh iteration seamlessly combines playful design cues from the past with cutting-edge features for a more efficient, user-friendly driving experience.

title: Genesis GV90 Magma Spied Testing as Brand’s First Full-Size Performance SUV
description: Genesis has been busy laying the groundwork for its new Magma Performance brand, which will eventually span from track cars to high-powered luxury EVs. The division was officially previewed earlier, with the GV60 Magma confirmed as the first model to reach production. Genesis says the GV60 Magma ...
titleSummary: "Genesis' High-Performance Flagship SUV Caught in Action, Redesigned and Revved Up"
descriptionSummary: Genesis is meticulously building up its Magma Performance lineup, a series that promises to seamlessly blend high-performance track cars with luxurious electric vehicles. The GV60 Magma marks the debut of this ambitious new venture.

title: BMW Is Still Dealing With Deadly Takata Airbags From 25 Years Ago
description: The scandal surrounding defective Takata airbags is one of the most infamous in the auto industry, but even more than a decade on from the first recall associated with the issue, there are still cars out there with potentially explosive airbags that could be hazardous or even deadly to drivers. A ...
titleSummary: "BMW Faces Ongoing Dangers of Defective Airbags Installed Decades Ago"
descriptionSummary: A notorious automotive scandal continues to pose a hidden threat on roads worldwide. Over a decade since the first recall related to Takata's defective airbags, numerous vehicles remain at risk of catastrophic failure, putting lives in peril.

title: Ford Says $30,000 Electric Cars Are “Right Around the Corner”
description: With EV demand slowly stabilizing, it's now clear to manufacturers exactly what customers and prospective buyers are looking for. Apart from better range and more durable batteries, price is quickly becoming a major factor. Taking that into account, multiple manufacturers have been developing and ...
titleSummary: "Affordable EVs on the Horizon as Ford Promises Sub-$30K Models Soon"
descriptionSummary: As electric vehicle sales reach a plateau, manufacturers are finally getting a clear picture of what consumers want most: longer battery life, rugged reliability, and – above all – affordability.

title: Ferrari’s Shares May Have Skidded — But Its Profits Are Still Flying
description: Ferrari reported net profit of $439.5 million for the July–September period, a nearly 2 percent increase over the same quarter last year and comfortably above analyst expectations of $423 million. The result underscores the resilience of the brand’s business model, which continues to deliver high ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari's Stock Takes a Tumble, But Underlying Performance Remains Surprisingly Strong"
descriptionSummary: Ferrari's quarterly earnings rose to $439.5 million, exceeding forecasts by $16.5 million, as the luxury carmaker's robust business model demonstrated remarkable adaptability and consistency in a competitive market.

title: Ford Drops Cheap 2025 Mustang Mach-E Lease Deal For November
description: There are many reasons to like the Ford Mustang Mach-E electric crossover, assuming you can get past the name. It’s fun to drive for a vehicle of this type, sportily styled, and has a competitive range on a full charge. It’s also more customizable than its Tesla Model Y rival, as Ford offers a ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Affordable Mustang Mach-E Lease Offer Vanishes for Good in November"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Mustang Mach-E electric crossover has won over fans with its engaging driving experience, sleek design, and respectable battery life after a full charge. Its customization options also give it an edge over the Tesla Model Y.

title: Volvo Has a Plan to Make the EX60 Cheaper Than Rivals
description: The upcoming Volvo EX60 is shaping up to be one of the brand's most important EVs yet. Essentially the electric counterpart to the XC60 – Volvo's global best-seller – the EX60 will slot into the fiercely competitive midsize premium electric SUV segment. Pricing is critical in that space, and ...
titleSummary: Volvo Readies Aggressive Pricing Strategy for EX60 Electric SUV Debut
descriptionSummary: The Volvo EX60 is poised to be a pivotal electric vehicle for the brand, directly competing with established players in the sought-after midsize premium electric SUV market. Its price will play a decisive role in its success.

title: 2003 Pontiac Aztek with 5,200 Miles for Sale: Once Mocked, Now a Cult Icon
description: Not only was the Pontiac Aztek a sales flop for General Motors in the early 2000s, but its haphazard design made it the butt of countless jokes in the motoring media and in car enthusiast circles. Fast-forward to 2008, though, and the maligned crossover’s image got an unexpected lift from a ...
titleSummary: "Rise of the Misfit: 2003 Pontiac Aztek Sells with Only 5,200 Miles"
descriptionSummary: The Pontiac Aztek's infamous reputation as a sales flop and laughingstock of the automotive world took an unlikely turn in 2008, when its awkward design somehow became endearing to critics and enthusiasts alike.

title: The Mercedes-Benz CLA You'll Care About Finally Revealed
description: Mercedes-Benz has been hyping up the new-generation CLA ever since it made its world premiere earlier this year. At the time, it was the electric version that was introduced first, although the brand promised that there would be ICE-powered versions in the form of hybrid options. Finally, that day ...
titleSummary: Mercedes' Most Talked-About Compact Luxury Sedan Makes Its Highly Anticipated Debut
descriptionSummary: After a highly anticipated wait, Mercedes-Benz is now unveiling the new-generation CLA with a twist: a range of fuel-efficient hybrid options, complementing its previously released electric variant.

title: Toyota Is Testing a 400-HP "Baby 2JZ" Engine That Could Transform the GR Corolla
description: The Toyota GR Corolla has earned cult status thanks to its wild 1.6-liter turbocharged three-cylinder engine, a tiny powerhouse delivering 300 horsepower and pure driver engagement. But that charismatic engine may not live on. With the reveal of a new Corolla concept in Japan came a fresh ...
titleSummary: Toyota Unveils Monster Inline-6 for GR Corolla: A Game-Changing Power Play
descriptionSummary: The Toyota GR Corolla has captivated enthusiasts with its razor-sharp handling and punchy 1.6-liter turbocharged three-cylinder, producing a remarkable 300 horsepower. However, whispers suggest this potent powerplant may be nearing the end of its road.

title: Honda Announces Irresistible 2025 and 2026 Prologue Lease Deals For November
description: So far in 2025, Honda has sold 37,359 examples of the Prologue electric crossover, a 104% increase over the same period last year. Sales took a big dive last month, with only 806 units sold, but this was expected across the EV segment after the federal tax credit fell away at the end of September. ...
titleSummary: "Honda Unveils Jaw-Dropping Leases for 2025 and 2026 Prologue Models"
descriptionSummary: Honda's Prologue electric crossover has seen a significant surge in sales so far this year, more than quadrupling its 2024 numbers. However, last month's tally took a notable dip, likely due to recent changes in federal EV incentives.

title: Toyota Says Its Next EV Batteries Will Last 40 Years — And They’re Almost Ready
description: Toyota, as an automotive company, has been the biggest EV pragmatist. Its outspoken and revered leader, Akio Toyoda, has been vocal about his considerations and has raised doubts about the EV push of the industry his company dominates. While their approach to EVs has been conservative, Toyota ...
titleSummary: Toyota's Revolutionary Battery Tech Promises Decades of Dependable Power
descriptionSummary: Toyota's cautious approach to electric vehicles is a notable exception in an industry driven by EV fervor. Led by CEO Akio Toyoda, the automaker has expressed measured skepticism, questioning the swift transition away from traditional powertrains.

title: Someone Turned an Alfa Romeo 4C Into a Ferrari-Style Speedster — And It Looks Incredible
description: Most one-off custom commissions start with a car that costs six figures, but not this one. Harse Autocraft, based in Ontario, Canada, was approached by a customer who wanted to create a speedster based on the Alfa Romeo 4C, a car that cost less than $70,000 when new and now goes for far less. ...
titleSummary: "Meet the Unlikely Result of a DIY Ferrari-Inspired Speedster Revamp"
descriptionSummary: In a refreshing departure from typical high-end custom commissions, Harse Autocraft in Ontario, Canada took on a project centered around an affordable Alfa Romeo 4C, with its original price tag well below the six-figure mark.

title: Ford’s F-150 Police Truck Just Got a Baby Brother — Meet the Ranger Cop Pickup
description: Ever since the venerable Crown Victoria became the de facto king of cop cars, Ford's grip on that market has been tighter than ever. Even after it was discontinued in 2011, the Taurus and Explorer-based Police Interceptors continued to carry over that success. Admit it, unless you have a keen eye ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Patrol Progeny: Meet the Compact Cop Cruiser That's Stepping Up to Duty"
descriptionSummary: For decades, the Crown Victoria dominated police vehicles, solidifying Ford's stronghold on the market. Although it ended production in 2011, its successors - the Taurus and Explorer-based Interceptors - maintained that momentum, making Ford the go-to choice for law enforcement.

title: Mercedes-Benz EVs Are on Fire Sale Right Now, With Up to $50,000 Off
description: Discounts are becoming surprisingly common in the luxury EV space. Rolls-Royce, for instance, is reportedly cutting prices on its electric Spectre – an unusual move for a brand that rarely touches sticker prices. Now, Mercedes-Benz is following suit, but with a broader sweep. The German ...
titleSummary: "Electric Deals Spark as Mercedes-Benz Slashes Prices by Up to $50K"
descriptionSummary: Luxury electric vehicles are defying expectations by offering significant discounts. Rolls-Royce has made headlines with price cuts on its Spectre model, while Mercedes-Benz is now making similar adjustments across its lineup of EVs.

title: Toyota Just Teased a New GR Model — And We Think We Know What It Is
description: Toyota has a creative way to keep fans talking about its Gazoo Racing performance lineup – through anime. The company’s GRIP series on YouTube mixes motorsport-inspired storytelling with product teases that keep enthusiasts guessing. It’s a marketing strategy that feels uniquely Japanese. The ...
titleSummary: "Toyota's Top-Dog Sports Car Gets a Sneak Peek, and We Have the Clues"
descriptionSummary: Toyota's innovative approach to hyping up its high-performance Gazoo Racing brand involves a surprising twist: partnering with anime creators to craft thrilling storylines and sneak peeks on YouTube, sparking conversation among fans and enthusiasts alike in Japan.

title: Honda Plans Bigger, Tougher TrailSport Models With Real Off-Road Upgrades
description: Honda introduced its first TrailSport model four years ago with the 2022 Passport TrailSport. It proved to be a masterstroke, as TrailSport variants now make up over 80% of all Passport sales, and the off-road-oriented trim line has expanded to the CR-V, Ridgeline, and Pilot. But Honda isn’t done ...
titleSummary: "Honda Takes on the Wilderness with Tougher, More Capable TrailSport Lineup"
descriptionSummary: Honda's bold gamble with its first TrailSport model in 2022 paid off, propelling this rugged off-roader into a dominant force across several key models, including the Passport, CR-V, Ridgeline, and Pilot. Now, the company is poised to push further.

title: Ford’s $13 Billion EV Losses Put the F-150 Lightning’s Future at Risk
description: While the F-150 Lightning has been a steady (but not spectacular) seller for Ford, sales recently plummeted due to the $7,500 tax credit scheme for EVs coming to an end. If anything, the EV offerings of the Blue Oval saw a steep decline in October. But it seems that the battery-powered pickup is at ...
titleSummary: "Fiat of Fate: How Ford's Electric Gamble Could Short-Circuit Its Best-Seller"
descriptionSummary: Ford's F-150 Lightning has struggled to gain traction despite its initial promise, with sales dipping sharply after the expiration of the federal tax credit incentive for electric vehicles. The trend continued into October, marking a significant downturn.

title: Toyota’s V6 Engine Nightmare Continues as Another 127,000 Models Recalled
description: Toyota’s bulletproof reliability reputation has taken another blow, and the same twin-turbocharged V6 engine is to blame. Last year, over 100,000 Toyota Tundras and Lexus LX models with this engine were implicated in a recall, with Toyota promising to replace the engines of affected models. Now, ...
titleSummary: "V6 Fiasco Deepens as Toyota Issues Huge Recall for Additional 127,000 Vehicles"
descriptionSummary: A fresh crisis has hit Toyota's reputation for durability, stemming from issues with its twin-turbocharged V6 engine. Over 100,000 Tundra and Lexus LX owners are affected, following a recall last year that pledged engine replacements. Problems persist.

title: Americans Are More Upside Down on Car Loans Than Ever — And It’s Getting Worse
description: Americans are sinking deeper into auto debt. According to new data from Edmunds, the average amount owed on an “upside-down” car loan — when a vehicle is worth less than what’s owed on it — has reached a record high of $6,905. In the third quarter of 2025, 28.1% of all trade-ins toward new car ...
titleSummary: "Record Number of US Car Owners Underwater and Debt Keeps Piling Up"
descriptionSummary: Auto debt in the US is reaching alarming levels. New data shows that nearly a third of car owners are trading in vehicles worth less than their outstanding loan balances, with an average debt of over $6,900 per vehicle.

title: Dealers Will Be Slashing Prices on These 3 Discontinued Cars This Fall
description: A handful of established models have been scheduled to hit the chopping block in the near future, and drivers could subsequently score a deal. Dealers are more motivated to clear an outgoing model’s inventory, since it’s a depreciating asset that’s taking up storage space from faster-selling units, ...
titleSummary: "Discounts Loom for 3 Defunct Models in Autumn Price Cuts"
descriptionSummary: Several outgoing models will be phased out soon, creating opportunities for car buyers to snag a discounted deal. As dealers make room for newer stock, they'll be more inclined to sell remaining inventory at a lower price.

title: First Porsche, Then Lamborghini — Now a Safari Ferrari Joins the Party
description: At SEMA 2025, Virginia-based GlasWerks DMV unveiled the Elevato, a radical reimagining of Ferrari's GTC4Lusso. The exotic shooting brake has been transformed into what the company calls the world's first luxury V12 Italian off-roader. The inspiration? GlasWerks DMV CEO, Adrian Mallory’s own Porsche ...
titleSummary: Ferrari's Adventurous Off-Roader Joins Exclusive Club of Ultra-Luxury SUVs Made by Rivals
descriptionSummary: At SEMA 2025, Virginia-based GlasWerks DMV unveiled a show-stopping makeover of Ferrari's GTC4Lusso, elevating the exotic shooting brake into a groundbreaking luxury off-roader with a potent V12 engine and an unconventional twist on Italian design sensibilities.

title: Stellantis Ex-CEO Says The Quiet Part Out Loud About Tesla's Future
description: In the not-too-distant past, Tesla was regarded as a major disruptor of the American car industry, as the now Texas-based firm had been at the forefront of developing some of the most desirable and bestselling electric vehicles ever to hit the market. No matter your opinion about the Elon Musk-led ...
titleSummary: Former Stellantis CEO Spills on Electric Giant Tesla's Uncertain Road Ahead
descriptionSummary: Tesla's impact on the automotive landscape has been significant, particularly in the US where it pioneered a new era of sleek, high-performance electric vehicles that captivated consumers and redefined the industry's trajectory.

title: This Fox Body Mustang Stole the Show at SEMA — and Now You Can Buy One
description: Velocity Restorations wowed SEMA 2025 with what it calls the world's first production restomod Fox Body Mustang. It’s a thoroughly modernized 1991 LX that's heading into production as part of the company's Signature Series lineup in 2026. The timing couldn't be better. Fox Body Mustangs are ...
titleSummary: "SEMAs Most Electrifying Star Has Been Spotted in a Garage Near You"
descriptionSummary: At SEMA 2025, Velocity Restorations unveiled its groundbreaking restomod Fox Body Mustang, set to hit the market in 2026 as part of the Signature Series. This innovative model masterfully merges classic style with cutting-edge technology.

title: Someone Finally Built the BMW Z4 Coupe — Using a Toyota Supra
description: The E85 BMW Z4 was available in both coupe and convertible versions, and the same applied to the E89 generation, but with the current G29 variant, BMW has only made the Z4 available with a convertible soft-top. Whether that's because BMW figured the Z4 occupies too small a niche to justify the ...
titleSummary: "Meet the BMW that's been reborn – with a Toyota twist."
descriptionSummary: For its latest iteration, the G29-generation BMW Z4 is offered exclusively as a convertible, marking a departure from its predecessors' dual coupe and drop-top configurations.

title: Don't Buy an EV Truck Until You See These Shocking Insurance Costs
description: When it comes to electrified vehicles, most automakers have the basics figured out. A giant battery, spacious cabin, and a dash-wide screen are the pillars of a great EV platform. Nailing the basics of EV crossovers and sedans has helped automakers branch into trucks and large SUVs, turning many ...
titleSummary: "Electric Trucks' Hidden Cost: Insuring Your Dream Ride May Be a Stunner"
descriptionSummary: With their fundamental needs met, electric vehicle manufacturers have turned to more ambitious projects: electrifying larger vehicles like trucks and SUVs, building on the success they've achieved with smaller crossover models.

title: Lexus Has Attractive 2025 GX Lease Deals for November
description: The Lexus GX has long been the sidekick of the larger and more luxurious LX, and it has fulfilled that role for over 20 years now. Following a (very) lengthy production run of the second-generation 150-Series model, the redesigned version made its world premiere in 2023. However, for its third ...
titleSummary: "Lexus Lures Buyers with Exclusive GX Leases in November"
descriptionSummary: After two decades as the LX's stalwart companion, the Lexus GX is due for an update. This revamped edition debuted globally in 2023, marking a new chapter in the GX's long-serving role alongside its larger cousin.

title: 2008 Lotus Elise California Edition For Sale With 3,300 Miles Could Be the Cleanest One Left
description: A 2008 Lotus Elise California Edition showing just 3,300 miles has surfaced for sale on Bring a Trailer, offering collectors one of the rarest and most pristine examples of the lightweight British sports car. It’s one of just 50 California Edition cars ever produced, evenly split between ...
titleSummary: "Rare 2008 Lotus Elise California Hits the Market with Impeccable Provenance and Low Mileage"
descriptionSummary: A low-mileage 2008 Lotus Elise California Edition has emerged for auction on Bring a Trailer, presenting an exceptional opportunity to acquire one of only 50 ultra-rare examples of this diminutive British roadster.
